name: Gustav Wonderful Adventure
description:
Help space ecoterrorist Gustav Rémenceault, answer his mighty call !

A worrying distress signal came from the mysterious planet Quidzy, where an innocent octopus is being attacked by horrible blob monsters !

Will Gustav Rémenceault be swift enough to escape the space police and reach the Quidzy planet in time ? Or is it already too late for the poor squid thingy ?

FIND OUT NOOOOOOOOOOOOOW !!!!!

Use Left / Right arrows to move your spaceship, and spacebar to shoot.

A little game made for the Trijam #121 Exploring spacetime. 

The goal was to made a game in 3h, here are our respective production time : 

Prud’hom Miguel 3h : character design and animation 

Nausicaa Fukuma 3h30 : FXs

Banti Konrad 12h : dev on Unity (I lost almost 5h trying to use NavMesh for AI, but movement was really bad so I decided to made it differently... A lot of idea are missing like slowing time, and some power up but didn't wanted to use more time)
